overview_of_class: Sentential logic: syntax and semantics, well-formed formulas, truth assignments, induction and recursion, sentential connectives, the compactness theorem. First-order logic: first-order languages, quantifiers, structures, deduction and proof, the Godel soundness and completeness theorems, models theory, applications to nonstandard analysis.
name: Mathematical Logic
title: WCAS MATH 370-0-51 Mathematical Logic

descriptions.name: Overview of class

subject: MATH
